title: Stock market news live updates: Stocks close lower as investors weigh U.S. ban on Russian energy - Yahoo Finance
content: Stock market news live updates: Stocks close lower as investors weigh U.S. ban on Russian energy  Yahoo Finance
description: Wall Street's main benchmarks attempted a comeback into Tuesday's close but turned lower as investors weighed an announcement by President Joe Biden that the U.S. will ban Russian imports of oil and energy, stoking worries the move could raise gas prices further and worsen inflation.
